official_title: To extend the sales period for the Christopher Columbus Quincentenary coin.

summary.text: Amends the Christopher Columbus Quincentenary Coin Act to extend the sales period for the Christopher Columbus Quincentenary coin from June 1993 to June 1994.

titles.title: To extend the sales period for the Christopher Columbus Quincentenary coin.
